Let’s get you started with your business email.
Your Credentials The IT Admin will provide your login information (email address and temporary password).
Then open a browser and navigate to https://rpnradio.com/mail or https://outlook.office.com/ and login with your credentials.
It is required to change your temporary password on your first sign-in.
Use a strong password you can remember.
On the Move? It is always best to use the desktop computers in work premises for email but sometimes we work out-of-office and rely on our mobile phones.
We suggest downloading and using the Microsoft Outlook email app from here: Microsoft Outlook for iOS and Android | Microsoft 365
Email Signature / Footer We require email signatures (footers) on newly-composed email messages.
See and follow the reference guide Standard Email Signature Guide
Going Online Tips Don’t use public WiFi Never open unsolicited emails Never click or open suspicious attachments file Use a strong password and change them regularly (quarterly or frequently) Use two-factor authentication (2FA, we recommend Microsoft Authenticator) Use a password manager (we recommend Bitwarden) Getting Help Contact IT admin thru email or Viber.

content:
This guide is for Outlook for Web on a desktop/laptop computer. Once done in desktop browser, you can use it when using outlook web on a mobile phone.
Outlook mobile apps does not support HTML signatures which is necessary to render the Image/RPN Logo to show up. Instead, manually copy and paste the standard signature on Step 8.
Open Outlook Webapp Open a web browser and go to Outlook.com Log in to your account Once logged in, click on the gear icon in the top-right menu A new pane will open. Scroll down the pane and click on View all Outlook settings. The settings window should pop-up. On the Settings pop-up navigation pane, choose Mail then Compose and reply You should now see the Compose and reply settings, and are ready to add the RPN standard signature Start by adding a name of the signature template: RPN Signature
Copy the standard signature below
CONFIDENTIALITY AND PRIVACY NOTICE:
This email and any attachment/s (‚ÄúEmail‚Äù) is confidential and for viewing only by the intended recipient/s. If you received this in error, please notify us immediately and delete all copies, including attachments. Any unauthorized access to review, reproduce, re-transmit, use or disclose the information contained herein is strictly prohibited.‚ÄØOpinions, conclusions, and statements in this Email are opinions, conclusions and statements of the sender and are not necessarily given, endorsed, espoused, or expressed by Radio Philippines Network Inc. (RPN). We reserve the right to monitor all Email communications through our internal and external networks.
This Email may contain personal and sensitive personal information, and will be subject to the Data Privacy Act of 2012, its implementing rules, regulations, and issuances of the National Privacy Commission of the Philippines (‚ÄúPrivacy Laws‚Äù). By viewing, using, storing, sharing and disposing (collectively ‚ÄúProcessing‚Äù) this Email, you agree to comply with the Privacy Laws. By responding to this Email, you consent to the Processing by RPN of the Personal Data contained in your reply Email.
Paste the signature into the text field in current Compose and Reply window. You might need to redo copy-pasting the RPN logo image if it fails to show.
You might also need to resize the logo image.
Click on Save, located below the settings window.
(Recommended) The window should stay open, and you have the option to use your newly created signature as default.
Do it by selecting it on the Select default signatures For New Messages dropdown button just below the text field. Save your changes. (Test it out) It should be automatically added when you compose a new message. Otherwise, double check your settings again if it was saved. And you might redo all the steps again.
You can always change the default signature setting anytime.
If you skipped on using the signature as default and want to do it manually: Create a new message It is advisable to insert the signature before writing your email. Do it by clicking the ellipsis (three-dots) on the bottom-most panel Click or hover on Insert Signature and select the standard signature You should now see the signature and you can now write your email before the signature. Getting Help Contact IT admin thru email or Viber.
summary: This guide is for Outlook for Web on a desktop/laptop computer. Once done in desktop browser, you can use it when using outlook web on a mobile phone.

This guide shows you how to add the standard time and date on RPN live stream
Pre-Requisites This guide assumes that you already have two text sources for the time and date in your scene(s).
Guide Download both .txt files from these links (or copy from the code below): Time Script
Date Script
/* Customized script for RPN Time Stamp in livestream by RedDavid */ var theTimeLocale = "en-US"; var updateInterval = 500; function getTimeString() { var date = new Date(); var theString = ""; theString = date.toLocaleTimeString([theTimeLocale, 'en-US'], { hour12: true, hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' }); var theTimer = setTimeout(getTimeString, updateInterval); SetText(theString, "Timestamp"); } getTimeString(); /* Customized script for RPN Date Stamp in livestream Made by RedDavid */ Date.shortMonths = ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sept', 'Oct', 'Nov', 'Dec']; function getDateString() { dt = new Date(); theString = short_months(dt); theString = theString.toUpperCase() + ". " + dt.getDate() + ", " + dt.getFullYear(); SetText(theString, "DateStamp"); } function short_months(dt) { return Date.shortMonths[dt.getMonth()]; } getDateString(); Open XSplit Broadcaster
On your current scene/stage, open the (Time) Text source Properties by right-clicking
Check Use Custom Script box which enables the Edit Script button
Use the Script tab if you instead copied the code
Click Edit Script button. This will open the Edit Script - Text Window
Choose Load Text from Local File as Template from the dropdown menu
In the File Path box, click the ellipsis to browse your .txt file created or downloaded. Keep other settings as is (or can Ignore Line Breaks). Finally click Update Text to save settings. It should now load the contents from the .txt file. Otherwise, try saving again on the .txt file or Click Update Text again on the Edit Script window.
Repeat process for the date source using the according script code.

This will show you how to edit and update scroll text in XSplit by editing a .txt file instead of editing inside the software
Pre-Requisites This guide assumes that you already have scroll text in XSplit.
Guide Create a new Text Document (.txt) somewhere secure in you desktop and name it appropriately (e.g. scrolltext.txt)
Open XSplit Broadcaster
On your current scene/stage, open the Scroll Text source Properties by right-clicking
Check Use Custom Script box which enables the Edit Script button
Use the Script tab if you instead copied the code
Click Edit Script button. This will open the Edit Script - Text Window
Choose Load Text from Local File as Template from the dropdown menu
In the File Path box, click the ellipsis to browse your .txt file you created in Step 1. Keep other settings as is but set Ignore Line Breaks. Finally click Update Text to save settings. It should now load the contents from the .txt file. Otherwise, try saving again on the .txt file or Click Update Text again on the Edit Script window.
Copy the scroll text source to your other scene(s).
You should now be able to edit the Scroll Text by editing the .txt file.
Getting Help Contact IT admin thru email or Viber.

We recommend following the standards for writing post content for RPN website.
Post Title Keep it short and precise Without losing the post message, keep the title to a maximum of 20 words or 100 characters Do not use stylized text from the internet Avoid text like these: ùêìùêáùêàùêí ùêàùêí ùêÄ ùó¶ùóßùó¨ùóüùóòùóó ùóßùóòùó´ùóß Use sentence case with proper nouns capitalized and acronyms all caps Example: Pimentel presses COMELEC to probe alleged vote-buying in South Cotabato Start your Title with your station name unless it already starts with one General Santos: Pimentel presses COMELEC to probe alleged vote-buying in South Cotabato Surigao City celebrates win at inter-regional football cup Post Content The WordPress editor (Visual mode) previews your content as nearly as it looks when posted. It also features a grammar- and spell-check for English. Always proof-read and double check your content.
Add locations for news posts
Example: Bacolod City - The revival of the Negros Island Region (NIR)‚Ä¶ Aim a target of at least 300 words
Images in Post Content You can paste in images directly to add more context to your post content Always give your images a contextual filename (e.g. comelec-chairman-speech.jpg) Prefer to use high quality images You can also create a gallery of images if these images are of the same content Include or mention original post author Mention or credit your sources Tags and Keywords Keywords for your news will help search engines show content from RPN website Tags will allow users to read more posts with related tags Examples: PDEA, illegal drugs, buy-bust operations, Zamboanga City, drug pusher Categories Check the Provincial News and ‚ÄúStation‚Äù News box respectively You may also check the box for other categories (e.g. Lifestyle News, National News) if your content relates to Featured Image Your content post will be shared across multiple social media platforms and the featured image will show to ‚Äúcatch attention‚Äù
Name your image files contextually
Example: vp-sara-duterte.jpg Prefer to use high quality images
How to write and others are available in this post HERE.

content:
In line with promoting our Digital Media, we are aiming for an optimized and better experience for our online audience. This new guidelines and/or standards for news posting shall be observed and followed.
A. HEADLINE This is to maintain legibility of the headlines
Follow the English Capitalization Rules
i. Capitalize the First Word of a Sentence:
Example: P44.19M road project breaks ground for Benguet farmers
ii.	Capitalize Names and Other Proper Nouns (e.g. DOH, ARMM)
Example: Dating Congressman Attorney Rolando “Nonoy” Andaya Jr hindi na kakandidato bilang Governor nang Camarines Sur sa 2022 election
Keep the Headline Text at Maximum 60 Characters (including spaces)
B. NEWS DETAILS (BODY/CONTENT) This is to satisfy search intent ‚Äì the more words to be indexed, the more the intent will be satisfied
Try to include news source location as start of content
Example: Davao de Oro — A total of fourteen solo-parent scholars under the Training for Work Scholarship Program (TWSP) graduated‚Ä¶
Aim for a Higher Amount of Words (See table below)
# of Words Website/Post Ranking 1000+ Best & Optimal for Search Engines 600-700+ Recommended Average Less than 600 Not optimal for SEO Try to Include Hyperlinks to Original Source or Important Keywords
C.	FEATURED IMAGE The image will be shown when the post is shared on other sites.
The Image should be Contextual with the News
The Recommended Image Size is 1200 x 628 pixels ‚Äì but should be at least 200 x 200 pixels to be picked up by Facebook or other social media sites
Smaller File Size the Better (maximum 2MB)
Name the Image File to Include Keywords (separate words with hyphen)
Example: mayor-sarah-duterte-speaks-to-the-public.png
D.	TAGS Beside categories, we can utilize tags to organize content and topics for better news recommendation and user experience
Separate Tags with a Comma
Add the Tags by the end of your News
Example:
Headline: [‚Ä¶]
Details: [‚Ä¶]
Tag: politics, events, technology, sports, apps, gaming, covid19, health, Rodrigo Duterte, DOH, business, lifestyle, Chinese New Year 2021
E.	SUBMISSION This is to standardize the way we send the news by email
Write the News (Headline, Details, and Tags) Directly on the New Mail Editor OR in a Document Format (.doc, .docx)
i.	If Written directly in the mail Editor, Include the Intended News Date before the headlines Example: DXKD Dipolog News February 15, 2021 Headline: 2 of the most wanted criminal‚Ä¶
ii.	If Written in a Document Format, Name the File with the Intended News Date Example: Feb. 15, 2021 ‚Äì DYKB Bacolod News
Attach the Document File and Supporting Images to the Email
Set Email Recipients to: [ommited for privacy]
Add the Date followed by your Station as the Email Subject: February 13 - 15, 2021 ‚Äì DXKO CDO News
summary: In line with promoting our Digital Media, we are aiming for an optimized and better experience for our online audience. This new guidelines and/or standards for news posting shall be observed and followed.
title: Website Content Writing

Here’s a step-by-step guide on how to use the 3D RPN logo for your stream using XSplit or OBS Studio.
There’s a new video file with full transparency but may not loop correctly.
Download the transparent video here.
Download the animated logo video, and save it on a folder/location for your stream sources. XSplit Open XSplit Broadcaster and select your scene. Add a new Source > Video file. Then select the file from the location where you saved it. Make it Loop
Open the Video file Source Settings (by Right Click > Settings, or Ctrl + Right Click) On the Media Tab, choose Forever on the Play settings. Remove the Black Background
Open the Video file Source Settings (again), and choose Background Removal. Choose Color Key option and the background should be removed. Otherwise, set the Red, Blue, and Green sliders to 0 and Threshold to around 25 as seen on the image below: Resize and Reposition the logo accordingly. Copy and paste source to other scenes if needed. OBS Studio Open OBS Studio and select the scene you want to add the animated 3D logo. Add and create a new Media Source Browse the media file from the folder where you saved it. In the same window, check Loop. Remove the Black Background
Right click the media source and select the Filters settings. In the Effect Filters, add a Color Key filter. In the Key Color Type, choose Custom Color and choose Black or #000000. Leave everything else on default. Resize and Reposition the logo accordingly. Copy and Paste the source to other scenese if needed.
summary: Here’s a step-by-step guide on how to use the 3D RPN logo for your stream using XSplit or OBS Studio.
title: Use 3D Logo in Stream - XSplit and OBS Studio
